title: The Nail Salon
description: In a world where appearances are everything … you can’t trust anything.In a pristine suburb outside of London everything and everyone is perfect … on the surface. But then one of their own – an innocent teenage girl – goes missing, and DCI Sue Fisher and her team start to investigate the secrets and lies of an interconnected web of bored housewives, cheating husbands, and disaffected teens.Now, as the veneer of perfection starts to chip away, dark secrets rise to fell the mighty and a community is brought to its knees…
author: Natalie Tambini
